generatedFrom: Heart of Bone Meta Skills Tree v2.drawio

modelNotes.skillActiveRule: A skill node is ACTIVE when it is reachable by blood flow from the root through currently-connected pipe tiles, and its gate requirements are satisfied.
modelNotes.pipePuzzleRule: Each diagram edge represents endpoints of a pipe path in the minigame grid composed of straight/elbow/tee tiles, rotatable in 90° increments.
modelNotes.prereqFillRule: Prereq counters (xor markers like 0/3) are filled by purchasing prerequisite upgrades in this tree; stacked upgrades contribute per-rank.

junction_split.rule: Standard split junction: any subset of connected outgoing pipes can be active depending on puzzle connectivity.

junction_multi_split_T_2of3.rule: Represents a T-pipe constraint: when 3 branches meet, the puzzle can connect at most 2 simultaneously (never all 3).

Unsheathe deals heavy damage.Executes. 15CD.

nodes.name: Powers
Blood Money:Executions damage Tommy but drop more black crystal
The Thrill:5 second Subsequent executions grant 50% attack boost. Stackable.
Terrify:Executions freeze witnessing entities for 2 seconds
Scare:Executions cause 1 nearby monster to lose track of Tommy for 2 seconds back to patrol
Quick n Dirty:Executions are quiet
Executions emit disorienting fog around the victim
Gambit:Executions have a 1%->5% chance to drop an item (5 ups)
Carnage:Executions cause an exp/shockwave- med radius- med knock- low dmg
Executions cause an exp/shockwave- big radius- med knock- low dmg
Executions cause an exp/shockwave- big radius- med knock- med dmg
Conditioning:Executions grant- 1 sec quietness- 1 sec invis- 2 sec 25% dmg
Conditioning:Executions grant- 2 sec quietness- 2 sec invis- 4 sec 25% dmg
Conditioning:Executions grant- 3 sec quietness- 3 sec invis- 5 sec 25% dmg
Max Devour charges raised to 2
Max Devour charges raised to 3
Max Devour charges raised to 4
Thick Bones:Grant +1%->10% max health (10 ups)
Amplified Trauma:Grant +1%->10% knife skills damage (10 ups)
Steroids:Grant +1%->10% arm skills damage (10 ups)
Meat Shields:Grant +1%->10% defense when carrying enemy (10 ups)
Executions detect all room enemies but grant 200% damage boost for 10 seconds
Executions dmg Tommy for 15%-10% health but refresh all cooldowns (5 ups)
Inner Pressure:Shockwave dmg deal +100%->150% of Tommy's health on [high]modifier (10 ups)
Shockwaves execute.
